page.title: 15RELIGION.
page.content: Predominantly{Church of England .}Only Church regularly attended by small congregation, minly older residents. Special Services include Christmas Carols, Easter Celebrations, Harvest Festival, and Thanksgiving, all of which are usually well supported. {Regular Sunday Services}are conducted. In 1985 the two parishes of Harberton and Harbertonford were amalgamated with those of Diptford and North Huish. All four are now catered for by {One Rector,}the Rector of Diptford. Services at North Huish are alternated one week Holy Communion in the morning and the next Evensong.
